image:image.image:title: MX Insights - Cost estimate calculator for in-housed media strategies - DOWNLOAD THE TOOLKIT
image:image.image:caption: Optimizing your in-house media tech stack According to a 2023 study by the ANA, 54% of in-house agencies handle some media planning/buying services. One-third have some in-house programmatic capabilities. Whether you have an established omni-digital, in-house media buying workflow—or you’re simply looking to track, reconcile, optimize, or pay for your media buys with your agency partners—use this resource toolkit to ensure you have the tools and processes in place to reducing risk, inefficiency, and errors. What’s inside: Checklists to ensure that your media workflow is powered with the technical functionality you need to ensure media spend visibility, budget control, and data-driven optimization. In-house and co-housing cost assessment sheet Roadmap and insights from major in-house advertising teams for scalable in-housing and co-housing strategies

News & press - Hudson MX Releases Findings of New Study, Revealing Four Stages of In-House Media Buying and Strategic Insights from Sixteen Top Advertisers
image:image.image:caption: August 23, 2023 An in-depth study by independent consultants at Modern Media Solutions provides a deep dive into in-housing practices, trends, challenges, and future ambitions of top advertisers in the U.S.

image:image.image:title: News & press - Hudson MX Receives New Funding to Fuel Its Expansion
image:image.image:caption: February 07, 2023 Major vote of confidence in its fully cloud-based SaaS enterprise platform for omnichannel media buying, billing, and paying. Investment helps scale initial customers, accelerates ability to onboard new agencies and advertisers.

image:image.image:title: News & press - Hudson MX named Top 22 Startups to Watch in 2022 by BuiltIn
image:image.image:caption: We've built a global team of experts—from Atlanta and New York, to London and beyond— dedicated to revolutionizing the media buying ecosystem. BuiltIn ranks us among the top Atlanta-based startups for more reasons than one.

image:image.image:title: News & press - Hudson MX Bolsters Its Senior Client Team with Set of Four Strategic New Hires
image:image.image:caption: In Strong Vote of Confidence, Bengzon, Caravello, Kopeloff, and Stoeckel Bring their Combined 115 Years of Diverse Advertising Industry Experience to Bear in New Client Engagement Roles

image:image.image:title: News & press - Hudson MX Announces Completion of Series D Financing of up to $63.5 Million Led by Ascential
image:image.image:caption: Investment Will Accelerate Global Scaling of Capabilities & Organization in Support of Growing Client Demand To Address Media Ecosystem Transformation

image:image.image:title: FinanceAssist™ - MX Blueprints
image:image.image:caption: Empowering Media Finance Teams: Creating New Value for Agencies and Brands The right technology gives teams across media buying organizations the ability to reimagine processes to fully leverage talented professionals, drive go-to-market speed, deliver nimbly on unique client needs, and provide timely insights to improve return on investment for marketers. Modern software eliminates the unnecessarily tedious battle to pay invoices on time and close the books while supporting forward-thinking finance teams in creating new value for agencies and brands.

image:image.image:caption: Fully-Automated Google Ads Invoice Ingestion Now Google Ads invoices can be automatically ingested without any manual intervention or processing required.

image:image.image:title: MX Product Roundup - Volume 4 - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: “Gone are the days of needing to manually and constantly string together bits of disjointed information to see where you or your clients stand regarding budgets. Let's spend more time making data actionable and using it to garner insights rather than just living in the data aggregation stage.” - Jason Kopeloff CFO, Hudson MX

image:image.image:title: MX Product Roundup - Volume 4 - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: “Standardization—paired with modular customization—empowers our users to create a match and pay ecosystem to designed for their own needs and strategies. When rules become cumbersome and stringent, our functionality is flexible enough to allow them to bend. This flexible approach acts as a sieve, freeing your AP department to focus on discrepancies and analysis instead of continuous manual entry.” — Brian Schmitt Financial Solutions Lead, Hudson MX

image:image.image:title: MX Product Roundup - Volume 4 - POs can be sequentially and concurrently tracked, internally and externally approved, and linked to multiple estimates
image:image.image:caption: POs can be sequentially and concurrently tracked, internally and externally approved, and linked to multiple estimates

image:image.image:title: MX Product Roundup - Volume 4 - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: Once configured, invoice matching rules allow reconciliation to occur automatically “as you go,” freeing up time and eliminating many common errors.

image:image.image:title: MX Blueprints (Copy) - FEATURED
image:image.image:caption: Strategies for the Digital Media Buying Frontier For many agencies and brands, the process of aggregating all of the steps and components necessary for digital media buying today is unfortunately wrought with a slew of manual workarounds. This starts with the planning stage, or pre-buy, where visibility of supplier costs needs to be matched up against goals and budgets. When it comes time for actualization, billing, and paying, invoice and DSP data can become a beast to consolidate. There are opportunities to save time—and money—at literally every turn, regardless of which platforms and data buyers want to use This begins with integrating your media buying tech stack and future-proofing your data taxonomy. READ & DOWNLOAD

image:image.image:title: MX Blueprints (Copy) - FEATURED
image:image.image:caption: Empowering Media Finance Teams: Creating New Value for Agencies and Brands The right technology gives teams across media buying organizations the ability to reimagine processes to fully leverage talented professionals, drive go-to-market speed, deliver nimbly on unique client needs, and provide timely insights to improve return on investment for marketers. Modern software eliminates the unnecessarily tedious battle to pay invoices on time and close the books while supporting forward-thinking finance teams in creating new value for agencies and brands. READ & DOWNLOAD

image:image.image:title: MX Blueprints (Copy) - FEATURED
image:image.image:caption: Creating and Executing Diverse Media Supplier Strategies The goal of understanding spending with diverse ownership groups is fairly straightforward. The real challenge has been that agencies lack the underlying technology that would enable them to access and activate timely, high-quality data for maximum impact. This practical guide will give you insight into how you can leverage data and technology to evaluate and adjust spend to meet your clients’ diverse supplier goals. READ & DOWNLOAD
